title: /!\ UNABLE TO LOGIN LOL /!\
body:
Hey everyone and thanks for stopping by.

My problem begun today (_last night everything was fine_). I open the launcher, launch, enter my password as the username is already set, click **login**, it process and then as usual the popup says: " **Login Status: Logging on** ". And there starts the **issue**, it just sits there showing the Login status, but **nothing happenes**. 

Can someone help? 

Thanks :D

replies.body:
Hi,

What ISP are you with?  Are you still having the problem?

We did hear of some potential ISP issues last night for some players, but they should be resolved now.

Cheers
Mindstar

Hey.

Thanks for the answer. 

I have simply _solved the issue_ by clicking on **repair** before launching the game, and it was able to detec the issue and repair it.

Therefore now it works _perfectly_!

Cheers!
